original_text: even if Noah, Daniel, and Job were in it, as I live, declares the Lord God, they would deliver neither son nor daughter. They would deliver but their own lives by their righteousness.
korean_text: 비록 노아, 다니엘, 욥이 거기에 있을지라도 나의 삶을 두고 맹세하노니 그들도 자녀는 건지지 못하고 자기의 공의로 자기의 생명만 건지리라 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: even if Noah, Daniel, and Job were in it
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 노아, 다니엘, 욥이 그곳에 있다 할지라도

sentences.original_text: they would deliver neither son nor daughter
They would deliver but their own lives
